description: The Royal Flush cocktail consists of peach schnapps, vodka, cranberry juice, and orange juice. In the past decade or so, it has become more popular at parties and other celebrations. The cocktail's popularity can be attributed to its refreshing taste and low cost relative to other mixed drinks.
name: Royal Flush

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the peach schnapps, Crown Royal whiskey, cranberry juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the peach schnapps, Crown Royal whiskey, cranberry juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for about 20 seconds or until thoroughly chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well for about 20 seconds or until thoroughly chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with fresh crushed ice if desired. Top off with club soda before serving.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with fresh crushed ice if desired. Top off with club soda before serving.
